Title: Silverlight - Cricket Scoreboard
Description:
The Cricket Score Board provides ball by ball update of match for both teams using Batting score card and Bowling score card. It also provides the four, Six, Out and Match over information through animation screens. 
•	An excel sheet is used for storing ball by ball score for Batsman and Bowlers.
•	The system reads the updated data from this excel sheet and generates a XAML file accordingly and updated XAML gets rendered at client location using Silverlight 1.1 plug-in to display the contents.
•	When any four, Six, Out or Match over events occurred it displays the corresponding attractive animation in full screen mode.
